original_text: Jesus said, ‘One day, two men went into the temple to pray. One man was a Pharisee. The other man took taxes from people.
korean_text: 두 사람이 기도하러 성전에 올라가니 하나는 바리새인이요 하나는 세리라

sentences.original_text: One day, two men went into the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 두 사람이 성전에 들어갔다

sentences.original_text: The other man took taxes from people
